title: What Gets In The Way Of Losing Weight
itunes:title: What Gets In The Way Of Losing Weight
description:
Losing weight is simple. You do my four basics and you'll see the scale go down for sure. But the four basics have a purpose. They make it so simple that all your excuses and other things that really get in the way of weightloss pop up.
 
Today we highlight some of those things that so many people are going through. Listen in to hear what we've come up with, and you'll likely start seeing some of your own too.
 
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse
